title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2564/92 of 2 September 1992 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2385/91 laying down detailed rules for certain special cases regarding the definition of sheepmeat and goatmeat producers and producer groups
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2564/92  of 2 September 1992  amending Regulation (EEC) No 2385/91 laying down detailed rules for certain special cases regarding the definition of sheepmeat and goatmeat producers and producer groups
THE  COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The section of Part I of the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 2385/91 relating to the geographical areas in the autonomous communities of Catalonia and Valenciana is hereby replaced by the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply to applications submitted in respect of the 1992 and subsequent marketing years. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 2 September 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 337, 4. 12. 1990, p. 7. (2) OJ No L 215, 30. 7. 1992, p. 63. (3) OJ No L 219, 7. 8. 1991, p. 15. (4) OJ No L 349, 18. 12. 1991, p. 14.
